goal.en: 1. To introduce the concepts, theories and models of marketing in the financial industry. 2. To discuss the importance of market analysis, planning and management in the financial industry. 3. To discuss global marketing strategy and integrated marketing communication strategies in the digital era of the financial industry.
goal.ch: 1. 介紹行銷管理的概念、理論與模型在金融服務業的應用。 2. 探討市場分析、規劃與管理對金融服務業的重要性。 3. 探討金融服務業的全球行銷策略以及在數位金融時代下的整合行銷活動。

content.en:
1. Defining Marketing for The New Realities
2. Marketing Planning And Management
3. Analyzing Consumer and business Market
4. Identifying Market Segments And Target Customers
5. Designing And Managing Products
6. Designing And Managing Services
7. Building Strong Brands
8. Managing Pricing And Sales Promotions
9. Designing and Managing Distribution Channels
10. Designing An Integrated Marketing Campaign in The Digital Age
11. Building Customer Loyalty
12. Tapping into Global Markets
content.ch:
1. 現代行銷新實貌
2. 行銷規劃與管理、執行行銷研究
3. 分析消費者市場與企業市場
4. 辨識市場區隔與目標顧客、打造市場定位
5. 產品的設計、管理與策略
6. 服務的設計、管理與策略
7. 建立強勢品牌
8. 定價管理與促銷策略
9.通路設計、管理與策略
10.數位時代的整合行銷溝通活動
11.建立顧客忠誠
12.開拓全球市場

textbook.en: Marketing management， by Kotler, Keller and Chernev，16th edition，Pearson Co. Ltd. Publisher.
textbook.ch: 行銷管理， by Kotler, Keller and Chernev，16版，楊景傅、徐世同編譯，華泰文化。
